app.name: VLC Remote - VLC Media player
app.description: Control media playback of VideoLAN Client (VLC) from your Android-powered mobile device.

app.name: SMS Backup and Restore (Call Logs)
app.description: SMS Backuper is a simple and powerful Android backup app . It is used to backs up and restores your phones SMS(text messages),Call Log , MMS , WhatsApp.

app.name: X2Image Convert to Image
app.description: Convert other file format to image(JPG or PNG). Supported: PDF , XPS , CBZ , JFIF , TIF , PNG , JPG etc

app.name: Notes - To do List
app.description: Good helper to manage your schedules and notes. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memo, email, message, shopping list and to do list.

app.name: Gallery : Nexus Gallery
app.description: Gallery+ is a faster , stabler ,more clear Photo and Video Gallery.

app.name: Play Music : Music Player
app.description: Play Music was crafted to be the best media player for Android. small, but is a powerful music player.

app.name: Rootuser : Superuser root user
app.description: Rootuser : Grant and manage Superuser rights for your phone.

app.name: Video Maker : Video Editor
app.description: Video Editing App For Android Platform

app.name: Super Terminal Emulator Plus
app.description: Super Terminal is a powerful terminal emulator for Android devices.
